alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:38PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hyde, west central Dare and central Tyrrell Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swan Quarter Ferry Terminal, or 26 miles north of Cedar Island, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Killkenny, Alligator, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Swindell Fork, Fairfield, New Holland, East Lake, Fort Landing, Buffalo City, Lake Mattamuskeet, Frying Pan Landing and Swan Quarter Ferry Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
